website_summaries.verdict: This is a good choice if you're looking for a light, compact golf umbrella that's easy to take with you wherever you go.
pros: Vented 58" double canopy to allow wind to pass through
Folds down to just 23" and weighs only 1.2 lb
cons: There have been instances of the ribs poking out of the end of the umbrella

customer_reviews.title: Not Windproof
customer_reviews.text: I usually do not give negative reviews but when a product falls way short of what it claims, I feel an obligation to let everyone know. The first 20 mph wind, the umbrella blew inside out. One of the plastic tips holding each rib fell off. I have had $5 umbrellas last longer. I would tell people the advertising about the durability of the umbrella in any type of wind 20 plus MPH is FALSE
customer_reviews.author: LARRY S

customer_reviews.title: I was sure it will protect me from rain and wind, actually didn't last even 5 minutes
customer_reviews.text: Beware!!! I have been so happy to get it and when I actually needed it in a regular rain it broke within first 5 minutes of usage. I have got my money back thanks to Amazon. Seller asked me to remove the negative feedback and wanted to give me a gift card in return. I know that if a manufacturer / seller applies lifetime warranty this means that he is absolutely confident with the quality of the product. Here is absolutely contrary.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: check the tips every time you use it
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: Contacted seller asking about getting replacement tips, and was offered a new item at no charge. Excellent customer service, added two stars. I will glue the new ones in place! Good size, collapses reasonably well, seems sturdy, but if the threads which go around the rib tips happen to loosen, the tip falls off and there's no way to re-attach the fabric to the rib. It would be simple to install spares, but you can't buy them and it stinks to toss an umbrella because a rib cap fell off. Used 5 or 6 times, almost new, return window is closed.
customer_reviews.author: S. EckertTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: the umbrella looks very nice and very good quality
customer_reviews.text: I've bought this umbrella 6 months ago. When I've received it, the umbrella looks very nice and very good quality. But after 6 months of usage, the seams of the umbrella start to come off, also the branches of the umbrella also come off the umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: rootchka

customer_reviews.title: Durable, doesn't turn inside out from wind, well made
customer_reviews.text: Purchased two of these for our office lobby - one of the best umbrellas I've ever, ever used. Easy open / close mechanism, exceptionally and thoughtfully engineered, heavy material and doesn't turn inside out in the wind. Bec they were for guest use and/or employee use when caught without an umbrella, I purchased the bright (!) yellow so they won't get lost or left behind in a car -- and I labeled them at the handle "Guest use - please return to lobby". Picked up two, heavy duty removable hooks for hanging them on the wall near exit door -- and so far, so good!
customer_reviews.author: GrammaC in NC

customer_reviews.title: Umbrella didn't open right out of the box
customer_reviews.text: I received the umbrella, opened the box, took off the plastic sleeve and the plastic around the handle, and pressed the open button. Nothing happened. I pressed it again. Nothing. I tried to manually open the umbrella...not happening. I have an umbrella that doesn't open so it is not particularly useful.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Money Penny

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for South Florida afternoon storms
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is brilliant. It folds to half the length of a traditional golf umbrella. The one touch open button works beautifully. The double layer is great when the wind picks up. The umbrella is large enough to keep me and my 5 year old dry when I pick her up from the school bus in the rain (the reason I ordered it). It rains so often here in South Florida, especially in the afternoon when kids get out of school, that I need a really nice, long lasting umbrella. I ordered two, one to keep in my car and one for my husband's car, and we both really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Bethimus

customer_reviews.title: Very Solid Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I've had this umbrella for a few months now and had several opportunities to use it. Overall, it's very good. The build feels solid. The handle is very comfy. It handles rain/stiff wind with ease. I'm confident it will last a long time. The only thing you should know is that it's not as compact as it appears in the photos. It's kind of a 'tweener – it packs up shorter than a big umbrella (even though it does cover you like a big one) but it's not one of those little numbers that you slip into your purse. I have an 18" long messenger bag and the handle sticks out a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Evrock44

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella and even better customer service
customer_reviews.text: Really nice and size-able umbrella to help weather the elements. My umbrella has been able to withstand 50 MPH gusts (though I would not recommend doing it on a regular basis!), but it ironically broke with a little breeze when it was caught at an awkward angle. The EEZ-Y folks were kind enough to send me a new replacement despite months of use and not having registered my umbrella before. Certainly a great umbrella, but I was far more impressed with their customer service. Definitely will buy from their company again!
customer_reviews.author: Ankit Garg

customer_reviews.title: not great
customer_reviews.text: I expected a lot more from this umbrella after reading all the good reviews. Should have read the bad reviews too. Feels cheap, and I'm totally disappointed that it does not have auto down. I had originally looked at the smaller version of this, which DOES have auto down. Then I decided to purchase the larger size not realizing that it DOES NOT have the auto down feature. I would not have purchased it if I had noticed this.
customer_reviews.author: Christine G.

customer_reviews.title: Love this umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I have now bought 3 of these umbrellas because I like it so much. Unfortunately, I lost the first one I bought and the second one I broke by letting a steel door slam on one of the tips (still works but one side the canopy obviously doesn't extend fully). Didn't even thing of buying a different umbrella and just ordered another one of the same. Excellent umbrella overall. It's a good size to protect me and still be portable. Made well enough to hold up to strong winds without being too heavy. I keep the compact one in my car and think that's a great umbrella too - just smaller so less coverage. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Tax_Atty

customer_reviews.title: Good umbrellas while they last
customer_reviews.text: I love these umbrellas but eventually the little plastic tabs that hold the fabric to the metal poles start falling off and you keep on having to put them back on when you open the umbrella. Its all good until then but both of the ones I purchased had the same problem. I ended up buying two more so they are still pretty good for the price but I wish they would fix the defect. **** Update March 28th 2018. I contacted the customer service team and they were awesome. They re-mediated the issue immediately and replaced my umbrellas. I have to say I am impressed. Very rarely do I see a brand stand behind their product these days.
customer_reviews.author: Entropylives

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Not at all what I expected. The umbrella stick is VERY FLIMSY AND LOOSE. Delayed opening. Also the stick is very short and needs to be held close to your face for maximum coverage. I purchased this umbrella particularly for windy rainy days. So far with the small gusts I’ve had no issues. You’ll get a small tug initially and then the air begins to flow through the vents.
customer_reviews.author: VILLA

customer_reviews.title: Dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two - the first one somehow got bent in the car - a little too easily for my liking... (I will post a photo later) - but I figured that this could have been our fault - so I ordered a second one and what annoys me is that one of the plastic covers of the spokes keeps coming off when the umbrella is folded, thus I need to put it back every time I open the umbrella. Very annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Vered & Roy Friedman

customer_reviews.title: It telescopes
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife. She likes that it is big enough and very lightweight compared to her previous umbrella. She is not crazy about the telescoping feature. When closed it is only half height, which is good for carrying when not is use, but when you want to sit the umbrella down to it can dry, the fabric is folded against itself, so it does not dry that well. She also says it makes it more difficult to fold up when done. However, she says she likes it otherwise and she can adjust.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Large umbrella that folds down to a small size
customer_reviews.text: I finally tested my umbrella out today and it worked just fine. What I like the most about it is that it is a large umbrella - easily big enough for 2 people to share - that folds down to a small size. That makes it easier to handle when I am getting into my car on a rainy day. The only draw back I have noticed is that the Velcro strips that hold it shut when not in use are a little too short. You have to pull them really tight to get them to work. But I guess I can live with that.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Nice sized travel umbrella
customer_reviews.text: When closed, this umbrella is pretty much the same length as your average travel umbrella (maybe slightly longer), but when opened, it is noticeably larger. It does feel a couple ounces heavier than the travel umbrella it replaces, but that's to be expected for a product composed of more material. It slides into its sleeve easily. It fits just fine in my car door's storage pocket. This is a sturdy product with auto open and close, which makes it effective for keeping dry on exiting or re-entering your car in the rain. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon4Me

customer_reviews.title: Good, but....
customer_reviews.text: The size is exactly what I wanted; however, three or four tips are dislodged every single time I open it. It appears that they pop off when the umbrella is closed. So, not only do the dislodged tips appear unsightly and diminish full coverage, but it's also extremely frustrating trying to yank the rubber tips back on each time I open it. While it's not the most expensive umbrella on the market, it's still pricey enough to expect better than average functionality I find from my $8 "back-up" umbrella - which is what I resort to using now.
customer_reviews.author: Mish

customer_reviews.title: 99.9% Sure this will cover me + backpack in college.
customer_reviews.text: Great coverage pressumably and exactly as described. I wouldn't really call the charcoal gray, well, charcoal gray. To me, for those who know Spanish, it looks like "Verde Seco". Roughly translates to dry green (like under saturated green). I am not sure how well it takes up against winds or heavy rain yet, but I will update when weather permits.
customer_reviews.author: Customer R. G.

customer_reviews.title: Umbrella Best on the Market
customer_reviews.text: Because I use my umbrella to shield me from the Sun as Well as the rain. I always invest a little more for QUALITY and Longevity. This umbrella is on stop shopping. It has an easy push button mechanism to open the '53cm wide umbrella before you get out the car. The enginuity behind the versatililty in size that fits into a little sleeve is Genius. Plus the forest green matches perfectly with my SanReve Versatile handbag. Love it will be buying another to match my spring outfits .
customer_reviews.author: Gwendolyn de Ashborough

customer_reviews.title: Not that portable
customer_reviews.text: Love the umbrella and how sturdy it is but I was looking for something more portable - something that would go in a computer bag or backpack. This umbrella is too long for that. It's almost as long as a regular-sized umbrella (not golf size) which makes this more cumbersome to carry around. If you're looking for a large umbrella that is half the length of a golf umbrella then this is perfect. If you're looking for something to throw in a bag, this might not be the right option for you.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, great customer service
customer_reviews.text: The fabric comes off the ribs EVERY TIME I close it! It is sturdy, and the fabric is nice and heavy. But every time I open it I have to put 3-4 of the fabric tips back on. Giving these to my closest enemies! ;-D Update: The company representative was very kind to replace the umbrellas. As I said before, they seem very well made. This time I used a hot-glue gun to glue the tips on and voila no more problem. Changed my rating from 3 stars to 4 because of the excellent customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Lee H

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella
customer_reviews.text: One thing I missed was the dimensions only because I was never "picky" about an umbrella purchase. The 58" meant the measure Over the top of the umbrella. That being said, We Love It! It IS big. We haven't had any really harsh winds when we were out in the rain. Gusts of 30 or 40(?) gave a quick, very slight pull on the umbrella and that was it. I was pushed by the wind a little bit more than the umbrella ;)
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: very well-made umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is much more tightly constructed than other golf umbrellas with wind flaps that I have had. I have tried quite a few golf umbrellas with wind vents, and with most of them, the upper and lower levels start to get inter-tangled, especially when you put the umbrella down. This one has never had that problem. It stays together perfectly. The handle is also very comfortable. Finally, the company's customer service is outstanding. I am a happy customer!
customer_reviews.author: discerningbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Poor durability
customer_reviews.text: Bought this umbrella 2 years ago and used it maybe a dozen times and the umbrella has two big holes. The holes are where the arms bend and fold the umbrella. I was shocked to find these holes but the fabric rubbing on the folding joints weakend it to the point holes let rain in. I would not recommend this umbrella. I have had similar Totes umbrella which I have owned longer last much longer. If you are looking for durability don’t waste your money in this umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Good for windy weather
customer_reviews.text: This is one serious umbrella. It’s so big and heavy you could fight a mugger off with it, I swear. When I scan people’s bus tickets, if my scanner gets wet it stops working. We have a lot of wind and slanting rain so I needed lots of coverage and strength. This fits the bill. But I needed it to fold up and stow in my backpack or I’d Forget it somewhere right away. It sticks out the top of my pack but sorta works. It’s also heavy as hell. I guess that’s the price you pay for a sturdy umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Orion Isis Gray Lumiere

customer_reviews.title: Light weight big for the whole family
customer_reviews.text: When I received this umbrella, I was amazed to see the packed size.. it was packed very small and is very light weight. When I opened it, it was huge. It covers me, wife and my daughter under it easily. The stylish design of double later helps in low to medium wind and keeps the umbrella sturdy. The material is very pores to keep sun and water out. It dries up quickly and coming very handy during the May month (rainy month) of mid west.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Mah

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy and Wind Resistant
customer_reviews.text: It was so windy in Philly today, I don't know how the birds stayed in the trees. This wonderful Umbrella is constructed with flaps that resist the wind. They work. This is a very sturdy umbrella and worth every penny of it's reasonable price. It has two straps to secure it when folded, one on each end. I am so very happy with this purchase. I purposely ordered a Yellow one; hopefully it will be easy to spot and I will not lose it. This is an excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Mary Segarra

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Folding Umbrella...
customer_reviews.text: We've just received our two EEZ-Y Folding Golf Umbrellas. Out of the box the quality looks impressive. The center staff is a sturdy constructed metal. The two piece canopy is the largest I've seen on a folding umbrella. It's made of quality materials and provides excellent coverage. We have not yet had the opportunity to test these umbrellas in the wind and rain, but I'm sure that will happen soon (we live in Florida). I'll update this post after the rain storm. UPDATE 6/26/17: Tried both umbrellas in a Florida downpour...worked as advertised, good coverage.
customer_reviews.author: Carl J...

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Seattle Umbrella! I’m Singing in the Rain!
customer_reviews.text: This is a major umbrella! It’s built like a tank ... and that’s meant as a definite compliment. It’s large enough to protect two people from rain and wind at the same time if you ever want to share. I got the very nice hunter green for a compliment to my beautiful Emerald City. The shipping was two days late, but the wait and small extra cost of the umbrella are more than worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Cat Lover

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Holds up in wind but difficult to close when getting into car, which makes for a soggy lap. *** I initially gave this product a lower rating because it wasn't a good match for me. However, I cannot speak highly enough about the wonderful customer service at EEZ-Y. After reading my initial review, they reached out to me with some product possibilities which may have been a better match than the golf umbrella. I selected the inverted umbrella which is perfect for me. I did not initiate any of this but certainly appreciate the outreach on their part. I highly recommend EEZ-Y based on quality of product and customer service! ***
customer_reviews.author: katho s

customer_reviews.title: Very Large Yet Compact!
customer_reviews.text: I love golf umbrellas but need them to be compact for storing in the back seat. The last one I has recently broke but I am excited to have this one; it's a little larger than my last on (which is fantastic) and I love the double canopy! Very easy to use and large enough for (2) large adults to keep dry. Great quality and I like that it comes with a lifetime warranty...hope to never have to use it but it let's you know the company stands behind the quality of their product.
customer_reviews.author: Rox Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Part of it broke after 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: I bought this with great hope, as it looked like a very well designed umbrella. However, after just 2 uses, the umbrella broke. One of the plastic nubs at the end came off, and one of the arms folded the wrong way. Will have to return and keep searching for a good automatic folding umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: DHC90024

customer_reviews.title: Ginormous umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is HUGE! It will be perfect for rainy bus stop mornings. With one press of a button it totally opens and unfolds with no effort or pinching of fingers. My husband actually took it to work one day to work on top of a roof AC unit to be sure nothing got wet. I might have to buy him his own. It’s a high quality item, not some cheap flimsy junk that will break in a windy day.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Quality you can feel
customer_reviews.text: Best quality umbrella I've ever owned. You can tell from just one use how solid it feels, and that it should last for years. I got tired of the mini folding umbrellas that always end up not working due to the many sections that need to expand, and compress when you use them. This umbrella pops open in a second, and is very easily manually closed. It arrived securely packaged in a box that was filled with packing materials. I highly recommend this umbrella if you are looking for a large quality umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Connie G

customer_reviews.title: Update:  Customer Service is Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Update: Company truely cares about it's customers and image. They read my review and sent me a brand new replacement umbrella without me asking for one. This is truly amazing service and thoughtful. I wish other companies cared this much. Nice work EEZ-Y customer service team!!! Original review: First...in a moderate to heavier rain the rain will begin to drip on your head through the material. Second...everytime you close it the little plastic endcaps covering the spokes fall off the ends of the spokes. So when you open it the next time you have to bend the spokes to fit back into the endcaps which spreads the umbrella be out. Terrible design and performance.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Churness

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase: didn't hold up as expected based upon reviews and descriptions.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this umbrella to help protect against windy, heavy rain days. The first strong wind gust I encountered about 2 months after my purchase caused one of the spokes to brake. The umbrella didn't seem sturdy to begin with. The material seemed extremely light and thin. I registered my product on 6/1/2019 and it broke the first week of August after just a couple of uses. I emailed the company about my situation and never heard back from them. So much for the guarantee for a replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Robbi H

customer_reviews.title: Looks like a quality product, with small closed profile.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't tested in heavy winds or rains yet, but it is nice and large when open, and surprisingly small closed. I may miss having the option of using it as a walking stick/ cane as I did with my old umbrella. But it is easier to set down somewhere without it getting in the way Edit:3-3-17 after a big rain storm a few weeks ago with very heavy winds and rain to the point an umbrella didn't make a bit of difference, the umbrella did fold backwards and a rod came disconnected. It was easy enough to fix when I returned home, but the umbrella isn't indestructible
customer_reviews.author: Jon Cody

customer_reviews.title: The perfect umbrella
customer_reviews.text: First, I love the color, the burgundy is very pretty but still unisex. The size is just right. Big enough so that it keeps me dry but not so big that it's awkward carrying or putting in the car. I wouldn't say it's big enough for 2 people in a downpour but is certainly big enough to keep 2 people dry enough in a light rain. I like having my own umbrella though! It opens up very quick and easy and it's also very easy to pull shut. I'm 100% pleased with this umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good - upper velcro has issues
customer_reviews.text: I do like it so far. This is the first umbrella that I've ever owned where it has 2 velcro straps - One in the "normal" spot, and one close to the top. The velcro patch on the one at the top is not secured too well to the strap, and one of these days, I need to break out my sewing kit and get that stitched back on more securely. Other than that, this is a huge umbrella that also relatively compact. My only wish list would be an auto open/close (vs it's auto open only).
customer_reviews.author: P. Whitby

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella
customer_reviews.text: After years of struggling with small cheap folding travel umbrellas, I did some research and purchased this umbrella. It’s great! Big enough for two people and not too big for one person. I like that it folds and isn’t a long stick umbrella. The color is bright and I’ll never misplace it. It’s a little big for my purse but it fits in my backpack which is what I primarily use for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Ali K

customer_reviews.title: Great Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 6 months ago. Has served me well. Has been in some hard rains, high winds and has performed as expected. I'm an outdoor guy and I have been out for hours in the rain. No issues. I recommend this umbrella but I have just gave mine to a friend last week. I just ordered a second one. I didn't shop at all for a replacement, as I was pleased with my original purchase.
customer_reviews.author: L. Peters

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrellas and great customer service
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of these umbrellas (compact and golf) and love them. Unfortunately the golf umbrella had a piece that snapped off it that made its usability difficult. I contacted the company and had a response immediately. They sent out a new umbrella at no cost. Great umbrellas. Great customer service. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: JLP

customer_reviews.title: Definitely better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Needed a new umbrella! Definitely better than expected. I usually like to get larger umbrellas to cover myself from the rain, especially this year in California. As I read about it's wind resistance and lightweight construction, plus it's size, I figured why not give it a try. When it arrived, it was light weight, and provided a lot of coverage from heavy rain and wind. Honestly can call this one of the best purchases I've made. So much so, that I'm thinking of giving several of these out as gifts.
customer_reviews.author: Adan  Encinas

customer_reviews.title: Bright Yellow is the best color!
customer_reviews.text: bright and cheerful, sturdy and useful. This is a great product at a great price. it is not a tiny folding umbrella--it is a huge folding umbrella and i can honestly say i don't get wet and it holds up to serious wind. If anything, i might do a mary poppins, but no annoying inside-out that i usually get from the tiny portables. It fits into my messenger bag nicely and when i need it, it opens out smoothly. the bright yellow is the best color, in my opinion, because cars have excellent visibility of you walking.
customer_reviews.author: V. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Breaks in the wind
customer_reviews.text: The first time this umbrella had to handle wind, it turned inside out then two of the staves broke at the joint. The metal pin pulled out and disconnected the staves. If the pin head was bigger I don't think this would have happened. Umbrella is now on its way to the land fill. will not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: qsquared

customer_reviews.title: Beware! Red color on real thing doesn't match picture.
customer_reviews.text: The real thing isn't even the same color red. Received it to only discover it was a washed out maroon. Utterly disappointed and even got screwed for returning it with shipping costs.
customer_reviews.author: kristine megrikian

customer_reviews.title: Does not hold up in the wind.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get an umbrella to keep the sun off me while I watch my grandkids play sports. This umbrella was difficult to hold. The straight handle put my hand in an uncomfortable position. It did hold up to a little rain shower, but inverted when the wind came. I'm returning it and buying a different one.
customer_reviews.author: J. Green

customer_reviews.title: Better than a personal canopy when at soccer practice.
customer_reviews.text: The handle could be a little longer, but this umbrella is fantastic. It's big enough to keep the sun off two people when at soccer practice. We stayed cooler under this golf umbrella than we did with a sun shade canopy. This is also great for the rain. Two adults can easily get across the parking lot without getting wet. The product has stayed strong and operated smoothly over and over for us.
customer_reviews.author: SculptedbyHim

customer_reviews.title: Great for rain use
customer_reviews.text: Living in the Evergreen state, we get random rain and sometimes a lot of rain. I love using this umbrella, especially when it rains. I thought this umbrella would have been horrible to carry but its actually pretty lightweight. I have had no issues with using this and even with some winds we get with our rain, I don’t have to try to fight to hold the umbrella. Its super great for our rainy state
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Zurilgen

customer_reviews.title: Good design; poor construction
customer_reviews.text: When I first received this umbrella, I was favorably impressed. It's larger than many folding umbrellas and has a wind proof feature. I also liked the two velcro closure straps (my previous umbrella hand only one, which didn't work as well). However, after only a couple of light uses, two of the feeble threads that attach the fabric to the ribs have broken and the end cap of the same rib comes off whenever I close and reopen the umbrella, compromising its coverage. In summary, the design is good, but the construction is not.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: There is no such thing as a wind-proof umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: I waited to write this review until I had used it in a significant wind/rain storm. The wind blew it inside out, but it flipped back into position and is OK now. The wind was probably 20-30 mph. I mainly just wanted a big umbrella. This one is 58" measured up and over the top. It's more like 50" if measured across the bottom edges. Color is nice. Because it's big, it's somewhat challenging to hold in one hand. It does protect a small backpack that I use from getting wet.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: pretty deceiving description
customer_reviews.text: Big umbrella, pretty deceiving description ... 58" is talking about the length of the rounded part of the umbrella .. not corner to corner so you really end up with a smaller umbrella than as advertised. Maybe thats the way umbrellas are measured, stupid if it is. Other than that really good product, just smaller than the "Golf Umbrella 58"... I was expecting.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Laymon

customer_reviews.title: A very high quality HIMYM type umbrella!!!
customer_reviews.text: When I opened this umbrella I was magically transported to MacLaren's Pub. Once I arrived. Barney Stinson apologized to me explaining that he had to do a Legendary magic trick to get this girls number. It worked and he left me here. Unfortunately, I did not have my wallet. So I’m stuck here in the bar with no money for drinks or a ride home. Can someone help?
customer_reviews.author: Reidamus

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product with a great warranty!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hey Tucker, I received my umbrella and it is excellent. I ordered two more, not that I am hoping for rain, but when it comes, I will be ready. I did have a bit of a problem attempting to register the umbrella to ensure it is covered by the warranty. I tried several times and never received a confirmation or email stating that I was successful. Please let me know if my umbrella is properly registered. Again, great product. Thanx!!! Rich
customer_reviews.author: Richard Phipps

customer_reviews.title: Keeps you dry and safe from the sun
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use! Press the button and it pops open. Quality materials and well made. Very large for rain protection as well as sun protection. Nice color and stylish for an umbrella. The push button pop out works well when getting out of vehicles and out of doors in the rain. Keeps you dry.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Cobb

customer_reviews.title: I love the yellow
customer_reviews.text: The color matches exactly what's shown. I love the yellow. It folds beautifully, and love the size (I previously used a golf umbrella). It has a similar width when expanded, but it's so small and compact when put away. I've been anxiously waiting for rain (for the first time ever since it always causes basement issues), but alas, none has graced me so far so this baby is still waiting for the first drops.
customer_reviews.author: Usaghi Tsukino

customer_reviews.title: Handsome + Well-built + Smooth-functioning Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I've taken my EEZ-Y folding golf umbrella out for several good rainy day spins and it does a great job. I selected the Burgundy color which is definitely a handsome and pleasing hue without being too bright of a red. The size of the umbrella is not over-whelming at all, which is a relief as the 58 inch size sounded imposing, but happily it is large enough to handle solo and still accommodate for two persons as needed; it does not "hog" all of the overhead air space on an average width walkway. It tucks away compactly when not in use. I give it five stars!
customer_reviews.author: La Gregg

customer_reviews.title: So far, so good,,,
customer_reviews.text: At this time I'm only giving this product four stars, mainly because I just received it and have not yet had a chance to use it! The four star rating I'm giving this product is based on being as described & advertised on Amazon's website, for the fast delivery I received, and for having a user-friendly website when I registered the product with the seller for warranty purposes.
customer_reviews.author: prbart140

customer_reviews.title: The way it is designed helps to keep it from blowing away
customer_reviews.text: I love how big this umbrella is. You can easily fit a couple under it, and maybe even add the kids too. It opens and closes easily and has a carrying strap and an easy to grip handle. It is also sturdy and lightweight. The way it is designed helps to keep it from blowing away too, even in a hard rain or stronger winds. We used it today and while my mom's umbrella got away from her and had to be chased across the yard, mine was easily manageable despite the gusts of wind that sent hers sailing.
customer_reviews.author: Tela

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't close with the button
customer_reviews.text: Large umbrella. Did well in heavy rain. However I soon learned it is manual close. The button only opens it. Which means you'll get wet getting back into your car. In addition it's not exactly easy to close. I haven't tried with wind yet. Other are saying it breaks within minutes. I guess i'll use it for walking my dogs where I have shelter to close it.
customer_reviews.author: Michaelene Waldron

customer_reviews.title: Not 58" Coverage
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella it is OK. A bit heavy and much smaller than I was hoping for. I saw 58 in the headline so I bought it but it is only 50 inch of coverage- the rest is in the curve... I wouldn't have purchased it if I read that was the coverage size
customer_reviews.author: fridmanbass

customer_reviews.title: Updated: May have gotten a lemon, but great customer service
customer_reviews.text: Does a basic job in very light rain, but with even medium rain the umbrella leaked water either through the fabric or the seams...also, the size collapsed is too large for an average work bag (fits in a duffle bag just fine though) UPDATE: The seller reached out within an hour of posting, and offered to send a replacement or different model of my color choice ASAP to give them another shot. The replacement arrived quickly and it does seem as though I may have just gotten a lemon. Overall, pretty satisfied with the quick actions they took to make it right!
customer_reviews.author: Fla20001

customer_reviews.title: It's really bright and beautiful on a wet gloomy day
customer_reviews.text: I got the yellow umbrella. It's really bright and beautiful on a wet gloomy day. I've only used it once, but it held up against a southern downpour. There is no button to close it, but I guess that's normal for such a large umbrella. It covered me and my dog really well. I think three people could fit tightly and two people comfortably underneath. I haven't tested it in high wind rainstorms, but I have high hopes! I took off a star for the lack of a button to close, otherwise it's awesome. The seller was fast and responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Broken :( --> REPLACED :)
customer_reviews.text: Really love how vibrant the color is (I purchased a red and a yellow one). Good size umbrella for carrying an infant carrier under. I purchased this umbrella two years ago but the plastic that joins the handle to the umbrella canopy broke and the release button isn't working anymore either on the yellow one (red one is still intact). I loved this umbrella so I was disappointed by the fact that it wasn't able to withstand two years of sparse California rains. LUCKILY... there is a warranty and the customer service was excellent. My umbrella was replaced quickly and without any hassles. I would definitely purchase this again.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Li

customer_reviews.title: Happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: It's a great size with good quality materials. It's a little heavier than I'm used to, so I wouldn't necessarily recommend it for someone who has weak wrists or arthritis. Also, the button you press to open the umbrella is very responsive, so you have to be a little bit careful how you hold it. I accidentally hit the button and it shot out, luckily no one was walking in front of me at the time. That has only happened once, though, and was totally my fault. Overall, I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: usckarina

customer_reviews.title: Holy Moly
customer_reviews.text: What a fantastic umbrella. Much more than I was expecting. It is huge and when I went to pop it open (with the 1 touch button) it was fast but I didn’t feel like it would fly away. Very sturdy, great colors to pick from and a good price. Very pleased with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: Best umbrella ever!
customer_reviews.text: Best umbrella I’ve ever owned! I have had plenty of problems on rainy, windy days of my umbrella turning inside out. This one hasn’t done it yet and I don’t believe it will. It’s a good size umbrella so it really keeps you dry, but it’s also light weight so your arm doesn’t get tired. I would highly recommend buying one!
customer_reviews.author: Audrey

customer_reviews.title: I'm pretty pleased with this umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty pleased with this umbrella. It feels solid and has a good weight to it. The fabric is thick and I love the foam handle. I like the 58" size as well... Bigger than a compact umbrella, but not as big and unwieldy as the giant golf umbrellas. When collapsed, it is about 2 feet long. Too big to fit into a briefcase or messenger bag, but it has a string through the handle to hang on something. If this had an auto-close function, I would have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Willster

customer_reviews.title: EEZ-Y Folding Golf Umbrella 58" Large is Awesome!!
customer_reviews.text: Product is great, it does what it's supposed to do and definitely seems to withstand the strong wind. The construction is good, it doesn't appear to give during a storm w/strong winds. The size is awesome when open, I kinda wished it also had a auto close but, I knew it didn't when I purchased it. Also, the size retracted is a bit larger than what I'm used to, I guess that's what I should be expecting because of the size when it's opened but, again, a bit larger than what I had expected. Overall, it's a great product and I'm satisfied for now!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Yasuda

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella
customer_reviews.text: It's really big! and very light. Great product for a great price. Note - there are two places that you secure the closure of the umbrella. One at the top which closes the flap part and the lower one which closes the whole umbrella. Comes with a lifetime warranty as long as you register your purchase on the website.
customer_reviews.author: KrazyKows

customer_reviews.title: Perfect service
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the medium size umbrella. It is a great umbrella but folded it is quite long and does not fit a backpack. They sent me the smaller one that is perfect for the umbrella compartment of the backpack. Well, it has a smaller canopy but would be enough when traveling without the car. They really care about the client satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: David BenJoseph

customer_reviews.title: Best umbrella I’ve owned!
customer_reviews.text: This is seriously the best umbrella I’ve ever owned! It’s HUGE and will easily cover two people. Opens and retracts very easily. It’s both sturdy and durable to protect against blustery wind gusts. It’s got a nice hand feel and isn’t unwieldy to hold. Exceptionally well made umbrella and I’m super happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Evette Rowley

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful except for the odor, which I hope goes away
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be of very fine design and hopefully quality materials. I would have given it five stars but it has that horrible chemical smell that we've come to experience with products coming out of China (think how our dollar stores smell these days). I have no idea what produces that strong, unpleasant and who-know-if-it-is toxic odor. So the umbrella has been rinsed and left in the garage to air out before I put it in my car.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny

customer_reviews.title: Love this umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I really do love this umbrella. I live in Northeast PA and it has been raining here pretty much all summer. I starting using this umbrella as soon as I got it. It is the perfect size for protection while not being too big to interfere with anyone else standing or walking by. It also holds up nicely in the wind. Also, there is a contrast in the colors when it is opened which I really like. It makes it look classy
customer_reviews.author: Lucinda Oliver

customer_reviews.title: Great Product & Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: My umbrella arrived damaged, but by no fault of the product as the box had clearly been mangled and abused during transit. I reached out to EEZ-Y about the issue and was very appreciative of their customer service. Not only did Chase get a replacement umbrella shipped out that afternoon, but he personally followed up a few days later just to make sure I was happy with the product (I am). The build quality of this umbrella exceeds any others I've used in the past. Considering the team who stands behind the product itself, I would confidently recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: CarlosBlanco

customer_reviews.title: You only need one umbrella
customer_reviews.text: This EEZ-Y umbrella is big enough for two. The handle is soft and squishy for a comfortable hold. The umbrella opens gently and closes easily and has a quality frame of fiberglass and stainless steel - no rust. I love the way it fits back into the carrying sheath - no tugging, it just slides right in. The double canopy feature, as well as the size, should help to keep the rain off and the umbrella firmly in hand in torrential storms - the wind won't catch it.
customer_reviews.author: nancyc55

customer_reviews.title: Works great, better coverage than a regular umbrella.
customer_reviews.text: This portable golf umbrella is great for keeping in the car or carrying to work. It's kinda long so it's not really a compact umbrella, but it's smaller than the real golf umbrellas and provides better coverage in the rain than a regular umbrella. No more wet backs or fronts during rain.
customer_reviews.author: Gweilo

customer_reviews.title: Opens and closes easily
customer_reviews.text: Love the size. Gift for my son who absolutely loves it for baseball games rain or shine for his boys. Sturdy feeling.. Easy to hold. Closes easily . Doesn’t drip all over because it is fast to close. It is just slightly smaller than the bigger golf umbrellas.
customer_reviews.author: Yoga student

customer_reviews.title: Best umbrella ever
customer_reviews.text: Best umbrella ever! Large enough to fit 2-3 people, sturdy, and reliable. I don’t have to worry about my umbrella flying away or breaking apart during heavy winds! I loved it so much I bought two.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

customer_reviews.title: It is durable and hasn't failed me yet.
customer_reviews.text: I never wanted a rainy and windy day like i did when i first got this lol i couldn't wait to take it out and see if it was as durable as it said. Yes it is durable. Yes it dose keep the sun off and when it is windy the vents allow the wind to go through the umbrella and not fold it up the wrong way lol
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but a bit fragile
customer_reviews.text: The handle wobbles in wind, and the "arms" are fragile: I had one break easily after placing the open item on my porch to dry. In response, the seller replaced the item worth a new one at no charge. If one can handle its handle's wind-wobbling, while treating the umbrella a bit more delicately than a typical umbrella, this product serves its purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: Blue-footed Booby

customer_reviews.title: Opens easily and made very well!
customer_reviews.text: It’s listed as a golf umbrella but I don’t golf. I was looking for one that came down the sides a little bit because the windy Michigan showers are upon us. It’s rained all week so it was perfect timing. I absolutely love it. Opens easily and made very well!
customer_reviews.author: Tasha

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Hard to find a good and big umbrella that isn’t a pain to carry, this one is it!! It closes up pretty small and opens up pretty big! Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: take THAT, wind & rain!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this after losing myriad umbrellas over the years. Sad to think how many are in the landfill. This baby is wonderful. I walked my dog in the rain and 30 mph winds and stayed dry and the umbrella stayed put. No taking off and inverting. Just a great little "bumbershoot." I can highly recommend this product - and it was delivered VERY QUICKLY! Thanks EEZ-Y!
customer_reviews.author: MCtok

customer_reviews.title: High quality retractable umbrella! Dries really fast!
customer_reviews.text: Pros: As a commuter at a college campus, rainy days can really be challenging, but this umbrella has helped me so much. It is big enough for two people, retractable and portable, and dries off faster than most umbrellas because of its unique material. The double layer also helps with the wind. Con: On really heavy rain days, with excessive use, I have experienced some water dripping on my head from underneath the umbrella. I believe this might come from water leaking in through the double layer when I shake off my umbrella before I close it up, but still odd.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Michaud

customer_reviews.title: Nice large size
customer_reviews.text: Large size umbrella. Love that it is windproof and could cover me and my kids when we go out. Easy open and close button makes this easy to use even when I only have one hand available. The vents help prevent this umbrella from flipping over like other umbrellas.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Full Coverage
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best umbrellas that I have ever owned.It is very sturdy and big with a 2 layer so there is less likely to get wind whipped and mess up your umbrella.It also has a button so you can get it open quickly.Sturdy handle so it won't bend or brake with a nice handle to hold onto.I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Donna Knoffloch

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it, not good.
customer_reviews.text: Did use it for the first time today, 2 months after I bought it, just today, it broke also today. This is not a windproof umbrella. Warranty is only for 30 days. Don’t buy it, that Is a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Gaby

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for less than a year
customer_reviews.text: This is a great large umbrella that folds nicely. I came in tonight from a downpour and put it on its side to dry off (as usual) and one of the bands broke inside of the canopy rendering that side useless. I thought it had a lifetime warranty but there doesn't seem to be a way to contact the seller
customer_reviews.author: Jeannette J. Mostrom

customer_reviews.title: Nice but just a large umbrella, doesn’t seem as big as my golf umbrella.
customer_reviews.text: Nice umbrella in a fun color. I wouldnt call this a golf umbrella however. More like a large umbrella. I wish it had an auto close feature. Have had a few months and haven’t had any issues.
customer_reviews.author: Andy M.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This EEZY umbrella works great. Had been looking to replace a large diameter compact umbrella that is no longer made. This 58" is large enough to cover 2 plus-sized people. The auto-opening works great, just the right amount of force. Too bad it doesn't have auto-closing, but I guess I can no longer have everything.
customer_reviews.author: fhallahan

customer_reviews.title: Leaks along seams
customer_reviews.text: Although the umbrella has no visible damage, it leaks considerably along the seams where little plastic barbs hold the canopy to the frame. When it rains hard, it will start drizzling under your umbrella too.
customer_reviews.author: StankFamily

customer_reviews.title: solid
customer_reviews.text: I have not had a chance to try this out in the rain but it seems very solidly made. It is longer than most collapsible umbrellas but to get a canopy this big into a more compact space you would need an extra set of hinges. I had a Totes umbrella like that which worked fine. I liked it, but their quality has fallen off apparently so I decided to go with this more highly rated offering. You can feel the quality in it when it opens. I will use it in tandem with a standard size Totes that is easier to carry around in smaller spaces.
customer_reviews.author: L. Geeslin

customer_reviews.title: Great product, even better customer service
customer_reviews.text: Received umbrella and had to contact customer service due to minor issue. I got response within hours and in two days I got received another umbrella free of charge. Otherwise, umbrella (I have 58 inch one) is very well built. I do see tiny hooks inside to secure fabric close to the frame. I haven't seen this on any other umbrellas. That should prevent umbrella to flip out on a strong wind. Overall, a very good umbrella. My only complaint is perhaps that it could be lighter.
customer_reviews.author: MP

customer_reviews.title: Will not open
customer_reviews.text: Received umbrella May of 2018 and did not open it, kept it in wife's car for use. When my wife attempted to use it in August 2019, it would not open. The release button would not depress. Very unhappy having spent almost $27 for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Macpherson

customer_reviews.title: Good umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my hubby who is a big man Anna's needs a larger umbrella, but wants a compact one. This one meets his needs. It's been great so far. Sturdy in the rain. It fits into the side slot of his work bag. We got the grey one, it looks good. Easy to open and close.
customer_reviews.author: HelloRosa

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Covers a large area while not taking up the room of a typical golf umbrella in my car. I carry this umbrella more often because of it's portability and will use it for sun protection while watching sports on the sidelines.
customer_reviews.author: NewHopeBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Great Umbrella with Awesome Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is really sturdy and has lasted a few years. I like how large it is and it really is durable for large wind gusts. The umbrella actually broke about a month ago and water started seeping in. I had a bit of trouble reaching the company for the warranty, but they made it right and I am super happy with my purchase. I have purchased a one or two other umbrellas (different sizes and colors) and would definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Perfect company to deal with and great umbrella.
customer_reviews.text: Bought a smaller umbrella from this company and love it, and am extremely satisfied with their products. The smaller one was great, but because I have to carry a backpack with a computer in it, it would not cover it. It is great when I don't have any things to carry, but this larger one does the trick and it's extremely well made too. Love the flap of material so that wind can escape and does not act like a parachute and drag me along. Well designed. Folds up so that I can put it in a larger carrying bag I also take with me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: EEZ-Y 58 Inch Folding Golf Umbrella with Large Windproof Double Vented Canopy - Strong Oversized Portable Family Umbrella - Foldable to just 23 inches
feature_bullets: UNBREAKABLE IS OUR MIDDLE NAME! The EEZ-Y 58” Folding Golf Umbrella features a vented Double Canopy that allows the wind to pass through, so it will never flip over and break on you, not even in the harshest rains!

KEEP YOUR LOVED ONES SAFE & DRY! Unlike any other rain umbrella, ours has an Extra Large 50” diameter canopy, providing perfect protection and coverage for your entire family! Created with a Super Water Repellent fabric and ergonomic EVA handle, it offers the best maneuverability & heavy-duty protection!

YOU'LL NEVER HAVE TO CHOOSE BETWEEN PORTABILITY & PROTECTION ever again! This portable large umbrella folds up to just 23”. It’s smaller and lighter (only 1.2 lb) than similar big golf umbrellas, perfectly suited for couples or for outdoor events.

WE PAY EXTRA ATTENTION TO EASE OF USE! Instantly open our windproof umbrella with just the click of a button. Nothing says Sturdy & Reliable like our Premium Fiberglass and Stainless-Steel frame system!

What’s better than our EEZ-Y Folding Golf Umbrella? Just OUR TOP-NOTCH CUSTOMER SATISFACTION PROGRAM! We’re here 24/7 to assist you with any issues you might have and we offer no questions asked replacements right away! Better products and the best in customer satisfaction! That’s the EEZ-Y way!

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
